thread.title: David Tennant's Sinister Villain Speaks in New 'Jessica Jones' Teaser
thread.title_full: David Tennant's Sinister Villain Speaks in New 'Jessica Jones' Teaser

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: David Tennant's Sinister Villain Speaks in New 'Jessica Jones' Teaser
text:
Comments The ominous voice of Kilgrave or The Purple Man is overheard in the clip as Krysten Ritter's character is gathering clue in her office. 
Netflix continues to hype up " Marvel's Jessica Jones " by releasing another teaser. The superheroine played by Krysten Ritter is seen in her office at Alias Private Investigations. She is assembling clue and evidence on the wall. While she is doing some investigation, David Tennant 's sinister voice as Kilgrave or The Purple Man is overheard, "Jessica ... I know your secrets. I know about your friends ... about your gifts. Jessica Jones ... I know everything." — Jessica Jones (@JessicaJones) October 8, 2015 The show will premiere November 20. It follows a young woman who battles demons from within and without after her short-lived stint as a Super Hero ended in tragedy. She is now rebuilding her personal life and career as a detective who gets pulled into cases involving people with extraordinary abilities in New York City.
